## Procurement Notice

Statistics Canada (hereinafter referred to as "Canada Statistics") invites bids from vendors for the procurement of a Laboratory Information Management System (LIMS) Software. Canada Statistics is seeking a comprehensive and adaptable LIMS solution to securely manage biological specimens, departments, and facilities within their environment.

## Project Overview

Canada Statistics is searching for cutting-edge state-of-the-art LIMS technology that will efficiently streamline the data collection and analysis process, ultimately delivering high-quality statistical results and improving scientific research. Preferred and functional software features include data management, analysis, reporting, and visualization.  The chosen candidate should be capable of offering real-time data visualization and integration with statistical software.

## Requirements and Evaluation Criteria

Vendors must provide an effective and adaptable solution complementary to the existing infrastructure of Canada Statistics. Offers will be evaluated on their compliance to Canada Statistics documentation requirements and DBMS requirements. Additionally, the proposal budget estimation, provided by the vendor, must be adaptable to variations in operating requirements.

## Evaluation Criteria
* Technical Merit(quantitative and qualitative performance index calculation): 60%;
* Price adjustment in regards to converted value: 40%.
